code: import*as _ from'lodash';export var findDoctorOption=function findDoctorOption(doctors,doctorId){return _.find(doctors,function(doctor){return _.toNumber(doctor.code)===_.toNumber(doctorId);});};export var findInsurer=function findInsurer(insurers,insurerId){return _.find(insurers,function(insurer){return _.toNumber(insurer.code)===_.toNumber(insurerId);});};export var findBenefit=function findBenefit(benefits,benefitCode){return _.find(benefits,function(benefit){return benefit.code===benefitCode;});};
